name: Dodrio

abilities.name: Retreat Aid
abilities.text: As long as Dodrio is Benched, pay 1 Colorless less to retreat your Active Pok√©mon.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dodrio.

flavorText: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

strengths: Retreat Aid reduces retreat cost for entire team
Multiple Dodrio stack for more retreat reduction
weaknesses: Rage damage depends on being damaged
synergies: High retreat cost Pokemon - Reduced retreat
counters: Gust of Wind - Force Dodrio active

competitiveHistory: Dodrio was a popular tech card for its Retreat Aid ability. Reducing retreat costs by 1 for all your Pokemon was valuable, and multiple Dodrio stacked. It enabled switching strategies that would otherwise be too expensive.

rulings.ruling: Multiple Dodrio on your Bench stack - each one reduces retreat cost by 1.
Retreat Aid only works while Dodrio is on your Bench, not while Active.
Retreat Aid can reduce retreat cost to 0.
Rage does 10 damage plus 10 for EACH damage counter on Dodrio (not just 10 total).
